Key.Original: Goddamnit, I've been missing my targets the whole day, I must be going blind.
Key.English: Goddamnit, I've been missing my targets the whole day, I must be going blind.
Key.Italian: Maledizione, Ã¨ tutto il giorno che manco il bersaglio, sto diventando cieco.

Key.Original: I thought it was me, these damn 6.5 rifles they've been issuing lately are pieces of junk.
Key.English: I thought it was me, these damn 6.5 rifles they've been issuing lately are pieces of junk.
Key.Italian: Pensavo di essere l'unico, questi stramaledetti fucili calibro 6.5 che ci stanno consegnando sono orribili.

Key.Original: You two best start practicing more, missing targets of that size at that range means you two have been masturbating instead of training your shots with your fucking rifle.\nGet a move on it or else you'll be practicing how to clean the shitters with your mouth.
Key.English: You two best start practicing more, missing targets of that size at that range means you two have been masturbating instead of training your shots with your fucking rifle.\nGet a move on it or else you'll be practicing how to clean the shitters with your mouth.
Key.Italian: E' meglio se voi due continuate a far pratica, mancare bersaglio di quella taglia a quella distanza significa che al posto di allenarvi avete fatto altro.\nDatevi una mossa o farete pratica a pulire i cessi.

Key.Original: Ooh, the captain sounds upset, better keep my distance from these two.
Key.English: Ooh, the captain sounds upset, better keep my distance from these two.
Key.Italian: Ooh, il capitano sembra arrabbiato, meglio se mi tengo alla larga da questi due.
